title: MBMBaM 596: Smartles
description:
We’re sure you all heard about the iHeartMedia Presents the iHeart Radio Podcast Awards, but we’re totally fine. Absolutely fine. Congratulations. Enjoy this completely regular episode.

Suggested talking points: EIGOT, Seeso’s Tapeworm, Bazinga Boys, Beef Mode, Over-Inflated Sense of Goku

National Black Women’s Justice Institute: https://www.nbwji.org/ 
Huntington Children's Museum: https://hcmkids.org/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy, Travis McElroy, Griffin McElroy)
